info.title: rb-cruncher
info.description: The Runblade CRUNCHER for ensuring safety, accuracy, and fairness

question.example: What type of ads are allowed on the Runblade platform?

answer.example: Runblade has a general policy disallowing adult content/items, alcohol, tobacco and gambling. Besides these all ads are subject to local laws and regulations and Runblade cedes authority to such higher powers.
